title: Pineapple
description: Watch and learn how to cut pineapples using Calphalon Self-Sharpening Cutlery.

asset.title: Pineapple
asset.description: Watch and learn how to cut pineapples using Calphalon Self-Sharpening Cutlery. For more videos, visit www.knifeskills.com
asset.author: Calphalon

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Okay here we have our pineapple. First, I'll take this top off. Just firmly grab it and twist. You want to use a chefs knife. You want to go down. Very important to have a sharp knife, especially as you take this outside layer off. Now that we have our pineapple cleaned, we're going to quarter it. All we have to do there is go straight down and then we're going to half these. Now we have quarters. Now to remove the core, we're just going to remove at an angle going straight down. Take one of these and we're going to cut it into a large dice. What we'll do with these guys, we're going to use a rocking motion with your fingers tucked back. This last piece what we're going to do is cut it just a little smaller. Once we have it here, nice slices. Okay here's out pineapple three ways, we have a large dice for a salad. we have a slice for a fruit tray, and a small dice for a chef.
